title: What are the most famous songs about Russia? - Quora

response.answer_text: About us, hardly others sing ? ) At home all songs are about Russia ), seriously, I'll think and write later. We don't, quite, sing "Oh Russia dear home" ), I mean, with the mention of the name. Usually, you sing about things in particular.About Russia sang Russian refuges, poor run-aways from home, after 1917 Revolution - that's who did! At home - you don't miss your country. When abroad - begin to. Might start singing )  Yamschik - do not drive horses. I’ve got nowhere to be in a hurry to. I’ve got no one to love, anymore. So, dear man, stop it, with urging horses to run. (  Waltz, about first WW times.   Fourth day in a row, stanitsa-s are ablaze/villages, ground burns under your feet. Wild horde are carousing, along river Don. Don’t lose your spirit! ), Lieutenant Golytsin. ? Sub-colonel Obolensky - hand out wine glasses ) . - And, in our rooms - now sit Comissars! And - our girls! - they take to their office/? study room? Cabinet! ) ah. Russian sun! _ - is- a great sun! Ship “Emperor” (ready to depart abroad) stands tight, as an arrow - still. - Listen, Poruchik Golytsin, what if, we turn back. What the hell do we need for - somebody else’s , alien, land.   In Manchuria hills Noch’ / night has approached. Quiet, just Gaolyan river noise Here, under the ground, our boys sleep. Sleep, men, sleep in peace. Nevermind you perished in battle with enemy. Your banner, washed by people’s blood, we’ll take forward. We’ll walk the road to the new, better ) life, we’ll cast off the yoke of slave chains! And - country and fatherland (people and state) - won’t forget your deed. Sleep, heroes - memory of you - motherland - Mother keeps. (1905)    Autumn wind (actually, English composer) Autumn wind tears leaves off, all nature round is full of sorrow But HOPE - it never dies. Heart - it knows - spring will come. Autumn will pass away, birch tree leaf will grow again. Dear darling hands will embrace us, again. Budet - will be - Happiness. Pridet - will come )- Lubov’ /love. )   Tayga, them, kilometres. A star! barely shining. Sibir’! Who’ll answer. To you, if you shout. Snows to the knee, frosts and snowstorms. I go to meet God, likely. He, alone, hears me. Will leave, at sunrise. Will be back, if I manage ) I’m not jealous anymore (some love triangle, likely) - I plan to drown in Siberia! )  Russkoye Pole /Russian Field nothing compares to you, no forests nor seas. field, you are with me, wind cooling my temple. you are what is motherland, so I tell you: Hello, ) Russian field - I am your wheat spike. )
For a starter — Rossia, performance Lyudmila Zykina  And, of course, Я люблю тебя Россия, performance Galina Nyenasheva
